nodes.text: Tony Harris (born 1969) is an American comic book artist who has illustrated the covers of Star Wars Infinities: A New Hope, as well as the article Special Ops: The Freelancer published in Star Wars Gamer 6.

On September 4, 2015, it was announced that he would pencil Marvel Comics' one-shot Star Wars Special: C-3PO 1. He has also provided the Newbury Comics variant cover to the first issue of the Vader Down crossover event.
Harris is best known for drawing DC Comics' series Starman and Ex Machina.
